install.name: UserTrace
install.author: D'Abronzo Vincenzo, Cristian Lupu
install.description: This component traces informations about your users.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #__usertrace ( id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, userid bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, username varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, ip varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, agent text, url text, ref text, time datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #__usertrace_config ( id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(254) NOT NULL default '', value VARCHAR(254) NOT NULL default '', note varchar(254) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
